titleStmt.title: A sober request to the Quakers: published by Jer. Ives.
titleStmt.author: Ives, Jeremiah, fl. 1653-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Smith at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhil near the Royal Exchange,
